quizQuestions.questionText: Which lifecycle method is called first when an Activity is created?
quizQuestions.explanation: onCreate() is the first method called when an Activity is created, where you should initialize your activity.

quizQuestions.questionText: What happens when you call finish() in onCreate()?
quizQuestions.explanation: Calling finish() in onCreate() will destroy the activity before it becomes visible to the user.

quizQuestions.questionText: Which method is called when the user presses the Back button?
quizQuestions.explanation: onBackPressed() is called when the user presses the Back button, which by default finishes the activity.
